name: Milotic
author: Atsuya Uki
flavor_text: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.

abilities.name: Lifeboat
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may use this Ability. Each player puts a Basic Pokémon from their discard pile onto their Bench. (Your opponent puts a Basic Pokémon onto their Bench first.)

attacks.name: Hypno Splash
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
